Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Hmm, this is a process analysis task with an event log. The user wants me to identify performance bottlenecks in a support ticket system. Let me start by calculating the total resolution times for each case to spot outliers.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Looking at the timestamps, Case 102, 104, and 105 seem to take much longer.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: I should break down each cases timeline to find where the delays occur. For example, Case 102 has a long gap between assignment and escalation, and then another gap before investigation.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Maybe theres a handoff delay or after-hours inactivity.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Case 104 has a similar pattern with a long wait after assignment. The triage also took longer here. Case 105 has multiple delays, especially after escalation. The overnight gaps suggest no 24/7 coverage.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: The common factor is escalation causing delays, but also long idle times between activities.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: I should recommend better handoff processes, maybe automated alerts for escalations, and consider extending support hours for critical teams.
